title: The Stridsland Beachcomber Dares to Be the N=1 You’ve Been Looking For
content:
The brand best known for not taking things too seriously is taking a serious dive into the ATB world with their first frameset.

Read the full article at The Stridsland Beachcomber Dares to Be the N=1 You’ve Been Looking For on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
